org.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT relations.id) FROM relations LEFT OUTER JOIN work_packages ON work_packages.id = relations.to_id LEFT OUTER JOIN work_packages AS froms_relations ON froms_relations.id = relations.from_id LEFT OUTER JOIN projects ON projects.id = froms_relations.project_id LEFT OUTER JOIN enabled_modules ON enabled_modules.project_id = projects.id INNER JOIN (SELECT work_packages.id FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('work_package_tracking') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True)) AS visible_from ON visible_from.id = relations.from_id INNER JOIN (SELECT work_packages.id FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('work_package_tracking') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True)) AS visible_to ON visible_to.id = relations.to_id WHERE relations.hierarchy = "$1" AND hierarchy + relates + duplicates + follows + blocks + includes + requires = 1 AND (relations.blocks IN ('1') OR relations.follows IN ('1'))
